item.title: 泛海广场的华人支持者提出了一个奢华的愿景。但如今，该项目仍未完工，其母公司也没钱了，而这座被涂鸦覆盖的高楼又给洛杉矶官员带来了一系列的当地问题
item.description: Oceanwide Plaza's Chinese backers set out a vision of luxury. But today the development remains unfinished, its parent company is out of money and the graffiti-covered tower is adding to a list of local problems for LA officials on.ft.com/49Ees83

item.title: 欧盟对该科技巨头是否利用自身平台使其音乐流媒体服务优于竞争对手进行了反垄断调查，此次罚款是调查的最终结果。
item.description: The fine is the culmination of an EU antitrust probe into whether the tech giant has used its own platform to favour its music streaming services over those of rivals. on.ft.com/3UI1Low

item.title: 一位高级银行家在法兰克福法庭上说，银行为他设立 "贷款交易主管 "的头衔完全是为了满足英国脱欧后的欧盟规则
